*This dataset contains environmental parameters: Temp, SAL, Nutrients*

Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggpubr)
library(lubridate)
```

Load Data
```{r}
d1<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv"))
```

Daily and Monthly dataframes
```{r}
daily<- d1 %>%
  filter(type %in% "daily")

monthly<- d1 %>% 
  mutate(Type = case_when(d1$date == "2022-07-07"  ~ "Monthly", #This makes 7-7-23 a monthly value for July
                          d1$Type == "Monthly" ~ "Monthly")) %>%
  filter(Type %in% "Monthly") 
```



Temperature Monthly
```{r}
temp2<- monthly %>% ggplot() + geom_point(
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = temp,
    color = site,
    group = date),
  size = 1)+
  theme_bw()+
  facet_wrap(~site)+
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Temperature (Â°C)",
    title = "Monthly Temperatures",
    color = "Site")+
  theme(
    plot.title= element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 20),
   # axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    #axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 1, angle = 45),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15),
    legend.position = "none",
    legend.background = element_rect(colour = 'black', fill = 'white', linetype='solid')) + #Moves legend onto plot 
    scale_color_manual(values = c("Blind Oso" = "#809C52",
                                "Canals" = "#ba4716",
                                "Gulf" = "#4c848c"))+
   scale_x_date(date_breaks="1 month", date_labels="%b")


temp2
  
```
Salinity Monthly
```{r}
sal2<- monthly %>% ggplot() + geom_point(
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = sal,
    color = site,
    group = date),
  size = 1)+
  facet_wrap(~site)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    y = "Salinity",
    title = "Monthly Salinities",
    color = "Site")+
     scale_x_date(date_breaks="1 month", date_labels="%b")+
  theme(
    plot.title= element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 20),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 1, angle =45),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15),
   # axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    legend.position = "none")+
    scale_color_manual(values = c("Blind Oso" = "#809C52",
                                "Canals" = "#ba4716",
                                "Gulf" = "#4c848c"))


sal2
```

Total Monthly Vibrio
```{r}
fig3 <- monthly %>%
  ggplot()+geom_point(
  aes(x = date,
      y = copies_mL,
      color = site,
      group = date),
  size = 1)+
  facet_wrap(~site)+
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Copies/mL",
    title = "Monthly Total Vibrio") +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 20),  #center title
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 1, angle = 45),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 15),
    legend.position = "none")+ #Removes legend
 scale_x_date(date_breaks="1 month", date_labels="%b")+

scale_color_manual(values = c("Blind Oso" = "#809C52",
                              "Canals" = "#ba4716",
                              "Gulf" = "#4c848c"))
fig3
```

Combine Temp and Salinity Monthly
```{r}
figp<- ggarrange(temp2,sal2, fig3 + font("x.text", size = 10), ncol = 1, nrow = 3,align = "v")
```
